snippet.title: Colorfiction 's Ode to a Moon - Teaser
snippet.description:
*Play the demo and wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1056680
Colorfiction unveils their upcoming game Ode to a Moon: A thriller investigating the aftermath of a sleepy town’s harvest festival. Will you unearth the truth or succumb to the unknown? 

*Homepage:  http://odetoamoon.com
*Twitter: https://twitter.com/colorfiction

Directed by Colorfiction

Music:
Aria from Suite n.3 - J.S. Bach (performed by Colorfiction)
Azure Horizon - Colorfiction
